scenariodescription: The robot starts inside a narrow aisle in the warehouse (NODE 79) with a box to transport. A human is standing at the opposite end of the aisle, blocking the passage. The human remains at their position until the robot moves out of their way. Once the robot is not blocking the human's path, the human begins to move towards their goal through the same aisle.

humanbehavior.Human 1: Human 1 stands still at the end of the aisle, occasionally looking towards the robot. When the robot moves out of the way, Human 1 begins normal navigation towards their goal in the aisle.

expectedrobotbehavior: The robot assesses the situation and, upon detecting the human blocking its path, it either moves to the side or finds another path to avoid blocking the human. Once the path is clear for Human 1, the robot proceeds to transport the box through the aisle.
